56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Zaid:that in the time (of the battle) of Al-Harra a person came to him and said, "Ibn Hanzala is taking the pledge of allegiance from the people for death." He said, "I will never give a pledge of allegiance for such a thing to anyone after Allah's Messenger (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْبَيْعَةِ فِي الْحَرْبِ أَنْ لاَ يَفِرُّوا
chapter.eng-name: To give a Bai'a for not to flee during a battle
